user.title: Choose what you want to measure
user.description:
Thanks for setting up MeasureIt! If you need help with the configuration have a look here: https://github.com/danieldotnl/ha-measureit.
Time measures the duration while a condition (template) equals true. Source will measure the value changes of another entity, while a condition (template) equals true.

time.title: Configure time meter
time.description: Configure the configuration name (used for sensor names and logging) and the unit of the measurement.

source.title: Configure source meter
source.description: Configure the configuration name (used for sensor names and logging), the source to measure and the unit of the measurement.

when.title: When do you want to measure?
when.description: Configure an optional condition (template) and/or the days and time when you want to measure. Default: always measure. When the from time is later than the till time, it is assumed that the time window crosses midnight.

sensors.title: Configure the periods to measure
sensors.description: Select the periods you want to measure (when the meter will reset) and optionally provide other fields. Each period becomes a sensor.
